'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The Sentinel Wall was once the Rathun's outermost fortification. Now it is damaged and littered with the ashen remain of their warriors.

==Points of interest==
* The Wall has been severely damaged by Eothas' passing. The passage to the north leads to a room overlooking the naked adra statue and has a few goodies. To progress, head to the workshop behind the locked door and deal with the Rathun in the way. You can try to talk them down - say you do not follow Eothas, then use Metaphysics 5 to note your soul wasn't eaten, Religion 5 to ..., or Insight 5 to point out their anger is misdirected.
